name: 20 Extreme Celebrity Feuds
description: Everybody likes a good fight, especially if the brawlers are A-list stars.  In this one hour special, weâ€™ll count down our favorite 20 celebrity slugfests.  Dueling Divas. Luckily we have our trusty panel of celebs featuring Alec Mapa, Jeffrey Self, Debra Wilson and more to put the likes of Snooki, Madonna and Megan Fox in their place.
